root.name: Sushi Academy
root.description: Old Sushi Master runs a world-famous restaurant, and his food is enjoyed by countless fans that would kill to know the secrets of sushi making. You are one of the lucky few to have the honor of being taught by the Master.Â Features Prepare meals, collect ingredients, and take exams via colorful minigamesLearn the history and proper etiquette of sushi by studying the sushipediaCreate dozens of exotic mealsBroaden skills on one of the oldest culinary cultures of the world
